name: Defiance: VBI Ultimate Pack
detailed_description:
Arktech. Some die for it – everyone kills for it.

Join thousands of players in Defiance, the Free-to-Play shooter MMO that defines MASSIVE CO-OP. Wield customizable weapons as you hunt for alien technology across a transformed Earth, and experience an evolving TV/MMO story with crossover content that expands the Defiance universe – all for free!

Make your home in Paradise with the VBI Ultimate Pack of the best kit in Defiance. You’ll stop world-conquering Volge dead in their tracks with a NEW Helldorado ATV and special Hellblazer Nomad Truck, massive inventory expansion, extra Character and Loadout Slots, plus boosts, gear, and 60 days of Patron status!

Features:

  • 75 Ark Keycode Capacity
  • 90 Inventory Slots
  • 4 Loadout slots
  • 2 Character Slots
  • 5 x 50% XP+ Boosts
  • 5 x 30% XP Boosts
  • 2 x 25% Score+ Boosts
  • 2 x 15% Score Boosts
  • Helldorado ATV
  • Hellblazer Nomad Truck
  • E-Rep Heavy Trooper Outfit & Headgear
  • Exterminator Cap
  • 4 x T4 Lockboxes
  • Title: Big Shot
  • 50 Arkforge (premium in-game currency)
  • 60-Day Patron Pass

You’ll stop world-conquering Volge dead in their tracks with a NEW Helldorado ATV and special Hellblazer Nomad Truck, massive inventory expansion, extra Character and Loadout Slots, plus boosts, gear, and 60 days of Patron status!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*
*languages with full audio support
reviews:
“Defiance is goddamned fun. It streamlines and refines the blast-and-loot ideals of Borderlands and Diablo into a slick package.”
Polygon

“… hectic, pulse-pounding, explosive, and fun.”
MMORPG

“A game with a scrappy attitude and a tight handle on what a massively multiplayer world needs to keep you coming back.”
Gamespot

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP2
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.0 GHz CPU or better
  • Memory: 2 GB System RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB video card (NVIDIA GeForce 8600, ATI Radeon HD 2900, or Intel HD 4000 integrated graphics or better)
  • DirectX®: 9.0c
  • Hard Drive: 15 GB free hard drive space
  • Sound: DirectX 8.1 compatible sound card
  • Internet: Broadband internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.4 GHz CPU or better
  • Memory: 4 GB System RAM
  • Graphics: 1024MB video card (NVIDIA GeForce GTS 250 or ATI Radeon HD 4750 or better)
  • DirectX®: 9.0c
  • Hard Drive: 15 GB free hard drive space
  • Sound: DirectX 8.1 compatible sound card
  • Internet: Broadband internet connection
